citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_84cd8b9b-7ffb-4ada-afa5-ab46a5aa9e69\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Tetjana\", \"family\": \"Ross\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"03\", \"05\"]}], \"abstract\": \"La profondeur de la couche mixte, la temp\u00e9rature de surface de la mer et les courants ont \u00e9t\u00e9 mod\u00e9lis\u00e9s \u00e0 l'aide de donn\u00e9es sur les flotteurs Argo pendant la p\u00e9riode d'\u00e9chantillonnage des exp\u00e9ditions en haute mer 2022 de l'Ann\u00e9e internationale du saumon. Ces visualisations mod\u00e9lis\u00e9es offrent un aper\u00e7u des conditions dans lesquelles le saumon passe l'hiver.\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Physique oc\u00e9anique mondiale et pr\u00e9visions de l'oc\u00e9an Pacifique Nord-Est en 2022\", \"version\": \"1\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://data.npafc.org/dataset/ca-cioos_84cd8b9b-7ffb-4ada-afa5-ab46a5aa9e69?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_84cd8b9b-7ffb-4ada-afa5-ab46a5aa9e69\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Tetjana\", \"family\": \"Ross\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"03\", \"05\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Mixed layer depth, sea surface temperature, and currents were modelled using argo float data during the sampling period of the 2022 International Year of the Salmon high seas expeditions. These model visualizations offer an overview of the conditions experienced by over-wintering salmon.\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Global Ocean Physics and Forecast of the NE Pacific Ocean in 2022\", \"version\": \"1\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://data.npafc.org/dataset/ca-cioos_84cd8b9b-7ffb-4ada-afa5-ab46a5aa9e69?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>Mixed layer depth, sea surface temperature, and currents were modelled using argo float data during the sampling period of the 2022 International Year of the Salmon high seas expeditions. These model visualizations offer an overview of the conditions experienced by over-wintering salmon.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="#fr">La profondeur de la couche mixte, la température de surface de la mer et les courants ont été modélisés à l'aide de données sur les flotteurs Argo pendant la période d'échantillonnage des expéditions en haute mer 2022 de l'Année internationale du saumon. Ces visualisations modélisées offrent un aperçu des conditions dans lesquelles le saumon passe l'hiver.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>
      <mri:credit>
        <gco:CharacterString></gco:CharacterString>
      </mri:credit>
      <mri:status>
        <mcc:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelists/cat/codelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode" codeListValue="completed"></mcc:MD_ProgressCode>
      </mri:status>

        <mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>oceans</mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>
      </mri:topicCategory>

name: ca-cioos_84cd8b9b-7ffb-4ada-afa5-ab46a5aa9e69
notes: Mixed layer depth, sea surface temperature, and currents were modelled using argo float data during the sampling period of the 2022 International Year of the Salmon high seas expeditions. These model visualizations offer an overview of the conditions experienced by over-wintering salmon.

notes_translated.en: Mixed layer depth, sea surface temperature, and currents were modelled using argo float data during the sampling period of the 2022 International Year of the Salmon high seas expeditions. These model visualizations offer an overview of the conditions experienced by over-wintering salmon.
notes_translated.fr: La profondeur de la couche mixte, la température de surface de la mer et les courants ont été modélisés à l'aide de données sur les flotteurs Argo pendant la période d'échantillonnage des expéditions en haute mer 2022 de l'Année internationale du saumon. Ces visualisations modélisées offrent un aperçu des conditions dans lesquelles le saumon passe l'hiver.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
